short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Messaging candidates and scheduling interviews has never been easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our chrome extension allows you to communicate with candidates and schedule interviews on the fly — decluttering your inbox and speeding up hiring.
 
It’s easy to get started…
Download the extension.
Sign in.
Start hiring. 
 
Recruiters are notorious multi-taskers. Paradox’s chrome extension makes it easy to manage candidates while they’re busy doing other work. The chrome extension lets you do a couple things: 
Enter candidate information.
Chat with candidates 
Schedule candidates for interviews. 
  
Our Mission: To build the most candidate-centric company on earth. That starts with delivering magical experiences that drive transparency, authenticity, and respect in the talent acquisition process — for every candidate, every time.
